pageContext.claim: “I’ve employed thousands of Electrical Workers. They will be voting for me!”
pageContext.analysis: Regular readers of The Fact Checker know we automatically award Two Pinocchios to anyone who gives sole credit to a president for economic improvements. That’s because the U.S. economy is complex, and the decisions of companies and consumers often loom larger than the acts of government. The number of electrical workers employed full time has increased since Trump took office, but there's little evidence that he personally did anything to make this happen.
